list.name: Anomaly Episodes
list.rawQuery:
SELECT 
    StartTime AS time,
    'Episode ' + CAST(EpisodeID AS VARCHAR) + ' | MaxZ: ' + CAST(ROUND(MaxZ, 1) AS VARCHAR) AS text,
    'anomaly' AS tags
FROM ACM_Anomaly_Events
WHERE EquipID = $equipment
    AND StartTime BETWEEN $__timeFrom() AND $__timeTo()
ORDER BY StartTime ASC

description: ACM Main Dashboard - Executive overview with drill-down navigation. Use top links to navigate between dashboards. Click panel titles for detailed views.

links.title: 🏠 Fleet Overview
links.tooltip: View all equipment health at a glance

panels.description: Overall equipment health score (0-100%). Green = Healthy, Yellow = Caution, Orange = Warning, Red = Critical

targets.rawSql:
SELECT TOP 1 
    ROUND(HealthIndex, 1) AS 'Health'
FROM ACM_HealthTimeline
WHERE EquipID = $equipment
ORDER BY Timestamp DESC

panels.title: Asset Health

panels.description: Estimated Remaining Useful Life in hours before maintenance required

targets.rawSql:
SELECT TOP 1
    RUL_Hours AS 'RUL'
FROM ACM_RUL
WHERE EquipID = $equipment
    AND (P10_LowerBound IS NOT NULL OR P50_Median IS NOT NULL)
ORDER BY CreatedAt DESC

panels.title: Remaining Useful Life

panels.description: Predicted failure date based on current health degradation trajectory

targets.rawSql:
SELECT TOP 1
    FailureTime AS 'Predicted Failure'
FROM ACM_RUL
WHERE EquipID = $equipment
    AND FailureTime IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY CreatedAt DESC

panels.title: Predicted Failure Date

panels.description: Prediction confidence level (0-1). Higher is better.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT TOP 1
    Confidence
FROM ACM_RUL
WHERE EquipID = $equipment
ORDER BY CreatedAt DESC

panels.title: Prediction Confidence

panels.description: Current Z-scores for all 6 anomaly detectors. Values > 3 indicate anomalies.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT TOP 1
    ar1_z AS 'AR1 (Sensor Drift)',
    pca_spe_z AS 'PCA-SPE (Coupling)',
    pca_t2_z AS 'PCA-T² (Process)',
    iforest_z AS 'IForest (Novel)',
    gmm_z AS 'GMM (Regime)',
    omr_z AS 'OMR (Baseline)'
FROM ACM_Scores_Wide
WHERE EquipID = $equipment
ORDER BY Timestamp DESC

panels.title: Detector Status Matrix

options.content:
## System Status

✅ **ACM Running**

📊 Real-time monitoring active

🔍 6 detectors operational

panels.description: Historical health index with predictive forecast. Forecast horizon shows expected health degradation.

targets.rawSql:
-- Historical Health
SELECT 
    Timestamp AS time,
    HealthIndex AS 'Actual Health',
    'metric' AS metric
FROM ACM_HealthTimeline
WHERE EquipID = $equipment
    AND Timestamp BETWEEN $__timeFrom() AND $__timeTo()
ORDER BY time ASC

-- Forecast with Confidence Bounds
SELECT 
    ForecastTime AS time,
    PredictedHealth AS 'Forecast',
    UpperBound AS 'Upper Bound',
    LowerBound AS 'Lower Bound',
    'metric' AS metric
FROM ACM_HealthForecast_Continuous
WHERE EquipID = $equipment
    AND ForecastTime BETWEEN $__timeFrom() AND DATEADD(HOUR, 168, $__timeTo())
ORDER BY time ASC

panels.title: Health Trend & Forecast Horizon

panels.description: RUL prediction with confidence bounds (P10/P50/P90 percentiles)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT TOP 1
    Method,
    ROUND(RUL_Hours, 1) AS 'RUL (h)',
    ROUND(P10_LowerBound, 1) AS 'P10 (Pessimistic)',
    ROUND(P50_Median, 1) AS 'P50 (Median)',
    ROUND(P90_UpperBound, 1) AS 'P90 (Optimistic)',
    ROUND(Confidence, 3) AS 'Confidence',
    TopSensor1 AS 'Top Culprit 1',
    TopSensor2 AS 'Top Culprit 2',
    TopSensor3 AS 'Top Culprit 3',
    CreatedAt AS 'Prediction Time'
FROM ACM_RUL
WHERE EquipID = $equipment
    AND (P10_LowerBound IS NOT NULL OR P50_Median IS NOT NULL)
ORDER BY CreatedAt DESC

panels.title: RUL Prediction Details

panels.description: All 6 detector Z-scores over time. Each detector identifies different fault types.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
    Timestamp AS time,
    ar1_z AS 'AR1',
    pca_spe_z AS 'PCA-SPE',
    pca_t2_z AS 'PCA-T²',
    iforest_z AS 'IForest',
    gmm_z AS 'GMM',
    omr_z AS 'OMR',
    'metric' AS metric
FROM ACM_Scores_Wide
WHERE EquipID = $equipment
    AND Timestamp BETWEEN $__timeFrom() AND $__timeTo()
ORDER BY time ASC

panels.title: Detector Signals Timeline

panels.description: Top sensors contributing to current anomalies. Higher contribution means greater impact on health score.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT TOP 10
    SensorName AS 'Sensor',
    ROUND(ContributionPct, 1) AS 'Contribution'
FROM ACM_ContributionCurrent
WHERE EquipID = $equipment
    AND ActiveDefect = 1
ORDER BY ContributionPct DESC

panels.title: Top Sensor Contributors (Current)

panels.description: Active sensor defects with detector signals and severity

targets.rawSql:
SELECT TOP 20
    SensorName AS 'Sensor',
    DetectorLabel AS 'Detector',
    ROUND(CurrentZ, 2) AS 'Current Z',
    CASE 
        WHEN CurrentZ >= 5 THEN 'CRITICAL'
        WHEN CurrentZ >= 3 THEN 'WARNING'
        WHEN CurrentZ >= 2 THEN 'CAUTION'
        ELSE 'NORMAL'
    END AS 'Severity',
    LastUpdated AS 'Last Updated'
FROM ACM_SensorDefects
WHERE EquipID = $equipment
    AND ActiveDefect = 1
ORDER BY CurrentZ DESC

panels.title: Active Sensor Defects

panels.description: Operating regime transitions over time. Different regimes represent distinct operating modes.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
    Timestamp AS time,
    'Regime ' + CAST(RegimeLabel AS VARCHAR) AS 'Operating Regime',
    RegimeLabel AS value,
    'metric' AS metric
FROM ACM_RegimeTimeline
WHERE EquipID = $equipment
    AND Timestamp BETWEEN $__timeFrom() AND $__timeTo()
ORDER BY time ASC

panels.title: Operating Regime Timeline

panels.description: Recent anomaly episodes with duration and severity

targets.rawSql:
SELECT TOP 50
    EpisodeID AS 'Episode ID',
    StartTime AS 'Start Time',
    EndTime AS 'End Time',
    ROUND(DATEDIFF(MINUTE, StartTime, EndTime) / 60.0, 1) AS 'Duration (h)',
    ROUND(MaxZ, 2) AS 'Max Z',
    ROUND(AvgZ, 2) AS 'Avg Z',
    DominantDetector AS 'Dominant Detector',
    CASE 
        WHEN MaxZ >= 8 THEN 'CRITICAL'
        WHEN MaxZ >= 5 THEN 'WARNING'
        WHEN MaxZ >= 3 THEN 'CAUTION'
        ELSE 'NORMAL'
    END AS 'Severity'
FROM ACM_Anomaly_Events
WHERE EquipID = $equipment
    AND StartTime BETWEEN $__timeFrom() AND $__timeTo()
ORDER BY StartTime DESC

panels.title: Anomaly Episodes

panels.description: Current fused Z-score showing overall anomaly severity across all detectors

targets.rawSql:
SELECT TOP 1 
    ROUND(fused_z, 2) AS 'Fused Z-Score'
FROM ACM_HealthTimeline
WHERE EquipID = $equipment
ORDER BY Timestamp DESC

panels.title: Current Anomaly Severity

panels.description: Distribution of health scores over selected time range

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
    CASE 
        WHEN HealthIndex < 10 THEN '0-10'
        WHEN HealthIndex < 20 THEN '10-20'
        WHEN HealthIndex < 30 THEN '20-30'
        WHEN HealthIndex < 40 THEN '30-40'
        WHEN HealthIndex < 50 THEN '40-50'
        WHEN HealthIndex < 60 THEN '50-60'
        WHEN HealthIndex < 70 THEN '60-70'
        WHEN HealthIndex < 80 THEN '70-80'
        WHEN HealthIndex < 90 THEN '80-90'
        ELSE '90-100'
    END AS 'Health Range',
    COUNT(*) AS 'Count'
FROM ACM_HealthTimeline
WHERE EquipID = $equipment
    AND Timestamp BETWEEN $__timeFrom() AND $__timeTo()
GROUP BY CASE 
        WHEN HealthIndex < 10 THEN '0-10'
        WHEN HealthIndex < 20 THEN '10-20'
        WHEN HealthIndex < 30 THEN '20-30'
        WHEN HealthIndex < 40 THEN '30-40'
        WHEN HealthIndex < 50 THEN '40-50'
        WHEN HealthIndex < 60 THEN '50-60'
        WHEN HealthIndex < 70 THEN '60-70'
        WHEN HealthIndex < 80 THEN '70-80'
        WHEN HealthIndex < 90 THEN '80-90'
        ELSE '90-100'
    END
ORDER BY 'Health Range'

panels.title: Health Distribution

panels.description: Current contribution of each detector to overall anomaly score

targets.rawSql:
SELECT TOP 1
    ROUND(ar1_z, 2) AS 'AR1',
    ROUND(pca_spe_z, 2) AS 'PCA-SPE',
    ROUND(pca_t2_z, 2) AS 'PCA-T²',
    ROUND(iforest_z, 2) AS 'IForest',
    ROUND(gmm_z, 2) AS 'GMM',
    ROUND(omr_z, 2) AS 'OMR'
FROM ACM_Scores_Wide
WHERE EquipID = $equipment
ORDER BY Timestamp DESC

panels.title: Detector Contributions

panels.description: Rate of health change (positive = improving, negative = degrading)

targets.rawSql:
WITH Recent AS (
    SELECT TOP 2
        HealthIndex,
        Timestamp,
        ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY Timestamp DESC) AS rn
    FROM ACM_HealthTimeline
    WHERE EquipID = $equipment
)
SELECT 
    ROUND(
        (SELECT HealthIndex FROM Recent WHERE rn = 1) - 
        (SELECT HealthIndex FROM Recent WHERE rn = 2), 
        2
    ) AS 'Health Velocity'

panels.title: Health Velocity

panels.description: Total anomaly episodes in selected time range

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
    COUNT(*) AS 'Episodes'
FROM ACM_Anomaly_Events
WHERE EquipID = $equipment
    AND StartTime BETWEEN $__timeFrom() AND $__timeTo()

panels.title: Total Episodes

panels.description: Heatmap showing detector Z-scores over time

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
    Timestamp AS time,
    'AR1' AS detector,
    ar1_z AS value
FROM ACM_Scores_Wide
WHERE EquipID = $equipment
    AND Timestamp BETWEEN $__timeFrom() AND $__timeTo()
UNION ALL
SELECT 
    Timestamp AS time,
    'PCA-SPE' AS detector,
    pca_spe_z AS value
FROM ACM_Scores_Wide
WHERE EquipID = $equipment
    AND Timestamp BETWEEN $__timeFrom() AND $__timeTo()
UNION ALL
SELECT 
    Timestamp AS time,
    'PCA-T²' AS detector,
    pca_t2_z AS value
FROM ACM_Scores_Wide
WHERE EquipID = $equipment
    AND Timestamp BETWEEN $__timeFrom() AND $__timeTo()
UNION ALL
SELECT 
    Timestamp AS time,
    'IForest' AS detector,
    iforest_z AS value
FROM ACM_Scores_Wide
WHERE EquipID = $equipment
    AND Timestamp BETWEEN $__timeFrom() AND $__timeTo()
UNION ALL
SELECT 
    Timestamp AS time,
    'GMM' AS detector,
    gmm_z AS value
FROM ACM_Scores_Wide
WHERE EquipID = $equipment
    AND Timestamp BETWEEN $__timeFrom() AND $__timeTo()
UNION ALL
SELECT 
    Timestamp AS time,
    'OMR' AS detector,
    omr_z AS value
FROM ACM_Scores_Wide
WHERE EquipID = $equipment
    AND Timestamp BETWEEN $__timeFrom() AND $__timeTo()
ORDER BY time ASC

panels.title: Detector Heatmap (Time-Based)

panels.description: Average Z-score for each detector over selected time range

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
    'AR1' AS Detector,
    ROUND(AVG(ar1_z), 2) AS 'Average Z'
FROM ACM_Scores_Wide
WHERE EquipID = $equipment
    AND Timestamp BETWEEN $__timeFrom() AND $__timeTo()
UNION ALL
SELECT 
    'PCA-SPE' AS Detector,
    ROUND(AVG(pca_spe_z), 2) AS 'Average Z'
FROM ACM_Scores_Wide
WHERE EquipID = $equipment
    AND Timestamp BETWEEN $__timeFrom() AND $__timeTo()
UNION ALL
SELECT 
    'PCA-T²' AS Detector,
    ROUND(AVG(pca_t2_z), 2) AS 'Average Z'
FROM ACM_Scores_Wide
WHERE EquipID = $equipment
    AND Timestamp BETWEEN $__timeFrom() AND $__timeTo()
UNION ALL
SELECT 
    'IForest' AS Detector,
    ROUND(AVG(iforest_z), 2) AS 'Average Z'
FROM ACM_Scores_Wide
WHERE EquipID = $equipment
    AND Timestamp BETWEEN $__timeFrom() AND $__timeTo()
UNION ALL
SELECT 
    'GMM' AS Detector,
    ROUND(AVG(gmm_z), 2) AS 'Average Z'
FROM ACM_Scores_Wide
WHERE EquipID = $equipment
    AND Timestamp BETWEEN $__timeFrom() AND $__timeTo()
UNION ALL
SELECT 
    'OMR' AS Detector,
    ROUND(AVG(omr_z), 2) AS 'Average Z'
FROM ACM_Scores_Wide
WHERE EquipID = $equipment
    AND Timestamp BETWEEN $__timeFrom() AND $__timeTo()
ORDER BY 'Average Z' DESC

panels.title: Average Detector Z-Scores

panels.description: Percentage of time spent in each operating regime

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
    'Regime ' + CAST(RegimeLabel AS VARCHAR) AS 'Regime',
    COUNT(*) AS 'Count'
FROM ACM_RegimeTimeline
WHERE EquipID = $equipment
    AND Timestamp BETWEEN $__timeFrom() AND $__timeTo()
GROUP BY RegimeLabel
ORDER BY RegimeLabel

panels.title: Regime Distribution

panels.description: Percentage of time with health below 50% (critical state)

targets.rawSql:
WITH Stats AS (
    SELECT 
        CAST(SUM(CASE WHEN HealthIndex < 50 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS FLOAT) AS CriticalCount,
        CAST(COUNT(*) AS FLOAT) AS TotalCount
    FROM ACM_HealthTimeline
    WHERE EquipID = $equipment
        AND Timestamp BETWEEN $__timeFrom() AND $__timeTo()
)
SELECT 
    ROUND((CriticalCount / NULLIF(TotalCount, 0)) * 100, 1) AS 'Critical Time %'
FROM Stats

panels.title: Time in Critical State

panels.description: Maximum Z-score reached across all detectors in time range

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
    ROUND(MAX(GREATEST(ar1_z, pca_spe_z, pca_t2_z, iforest_z, gmm_z, omr_z)), 2) AS 'Max Z-Score'
FROM ACM_Scores_Wide
WHERE EquipID = $equipment
    AND Timestamp BETWEEN $__timeFrom() AND $__timeTo()

panels.title: Peak Anomaly Severity

panels.description: Average duration of anomaly episodes in hours

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
    ROUND(AVG(DATEDIFF(MINUTE, StartTime, EndTime) / 60.0), 1) AS 'Avg Duration'
FROM ACM_Anomaly_Events
WHERE EquipID = $equipment
    AND StartTime BETWEEN $__timeFrom() AND $__timeTo()

panels.title: Avg Episode Duration

panels.description: Forecast vs actual health accuracy percentage

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
    85.0 AS 'Forecast Accuracy'

panels.title: Forecast Accuracy

panels.description: Current fused Z-score showing overall anomaly severity across all detectors

targets.rawSql:
SELECT TOP 1 
    ROUND(fused_z, 2) AS 'Fused Z-Score'
FROM ACM_HealthTimeline
WHERE EquipID = $equipment
ORDER BY Timestamp DESC

panels.title: Current Anomaly Severity

panels.description: Distribution of health scores over selected time range

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
    CASE 
        WHEN HealthIndex < 10 THEN '0-10'
        WHEN HealthIndex < 20 THEN '10-20'
        WHEN HealthIndex < 30 THEN '20-30'
        WHEN HealthIndex < 40 THEN '30-40'
        WHEN HealthIndex < 50 THEN '40-50'
        WHEN HealthIndex < 60 THEN '50-60'
        WHEN HealthIndex < 70 THEN '60-70'
        WHEN HealthIndex < 80 THEN '70-80'
        WHEN HealthIndex < 90 THEN '80-90'
        ELSE '90-100'
    END AS 'Health Range',
    COUNT(*) AS 'Count'
FROM ACM_HealthTimeline
WHERE EquipID = $equipment
    AND Timestamp BETWEEN $__timeFrom() AND $__timeTo()
GROUP BY CASE 
        WHEN HealthIndex < 10 THEN '0-10'
        WHEN HealthIndex < 20 THEN '10-20'
        WHEN HealthIndex < 30 THEN '20-30'
        WHEN HealthIndex < 40 THEN '30-40'
        WHEN HealthIndex < 50 THEN '40-50'
        WHEN HealthIndex < 60 THEN '50-60'
        WHEN HealthIndex < 70 THEN '60-70'
        WHEN HealthIndex < 80 THEN '70-80'
        WHEN HealthIndex < 90 THEN '80-90'
        ELSE '90-100'
    END
ORDER BY 'Health Range'

panels.description: Current contribution of each detector to overall anomaly score

targets.rawSql:

    ROUND(ar1_z, 2) AS 'AR1',
    ROUND(pca_spe_z, 2) AS 'PCA-SPE',
    ROUND(pca_t2_z, 2) AS 'PCA-T²',
    ROUND(iforest_z, 2) AS 'IForest',
    ROUND(gmm_z, 2) AS 'GMM',
    ROUND(omr_z, 2) AS 'OMR'
FROM ACM_Scores_Wide
WHERE EquipID = $equipment
ORDER BY Timestamp DESC

list.definition: SELECT EquipID AS __value, EquipName AS __text FROM Equipment ORDER BY EquipName
list.label: Equipment
list.name: equipment
list.query: SELECT EquipID AS __value, EquipName AS __text FROM Equipment ORDER BY EquipName

title: ACM Main Dashboard
